answers.answer: It's possible you thyroid medication is at the wrong levels.  It's possible they didn't address all your thyroid hormones; most times they just go after one or two.  Could be related to your illness.  If you don't feel your docs are giving you enough attention maybe see different specialists for another opinion, as blood sugar problems and thyroid problems are a big cause of physiological anxiety.

title: Medical induced anxiety
